item.title: 纳斯达克推动推出代币化证券交易
item.description: 纳斯达克正与美国监管机构合作推出代币化证券交易，成为华尔街最新一家在特朗普政府放宽加密货币监管之际加倍努力推动代币化热潮的主要金融企业。【原文：Nasdaq is working with U.S. regulators to introduce trading of tokenized securities, becoming the latest major financial player on Wall Street to double down on a boom in tokenization amid an easing of crypto regulations under the Trump administration.】

item.title: 米莱伊在布宜诺斯艾利斯投票中惨败后，阿根廷市场将继续下滑
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊领导的执政党在布宜诺斯艾利斯省的选举中惨败，使该国紧张的市场有望延续近期的跌势，在10月份的关键投票前增加了不确定性。【原文：A heavy election defeat for Argentine President Javier Milei's ruling party in Buenos Aires province put the country's strained markets on track to extend a recent selloff, raising uncertainty ahead of a key October vote.】

item.title: 与 PIF 达成初步协议后，麦格理寻求在沙特阿拉伯建立基地
item.description: 麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management，MAM）周一表示，在与海湾国家价值 9,250 亿美元的主权财富基金 PIF 签署了旨在促进对沙特投资的初步协议后，该公司正寻求在沙特设立办事处。【原文：Macquarie Asset Management (MAM) is looking to set up an office in Saudi Arabia after signing a preliminary agreement with the Gulf country's $925 billion sovereign wealth fund PIF aimed at boosting investment into the kingdom, they said on Monday.】

item.title: PNC Financial 将以 41 亿美元收购规模较小的竞争对手 FirstBank
item.description: 美国 PNC Financial 银行周一表示，将以 41 亿美元的现金加股票交易收购总部位于科罗拉多州的 FirstBank Holding。【原文：U.S. bank PNC Financial said on Monday it will buy Colorado-based FirstBank Holding in a $4.1 billion cash-and-stock deal.】

item.title: Olidata 着眼于通过并购实现增长，专注于意大利市场 - 主席 Rufini
item.description: 意大利信息技术和网络安全集团 Olidata 的董事长兼主要股东克里斯蒂亚诺-鲁菲尼（Cristiano Rufini）在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司的目标是通过并购实现增长，尤其是在意大利。【原文：Olidata , the Italian information technology and cyber security group, is aiming to grow through mergers and acquisitions, particularly in Italy, and could clinch a deal before the end of the year, chairman and main shareholder, Cristiano Rufini, said in an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 关税壁垒增加，中国审查贸易法更新版
item.description: 中国最高立法机构周一开始审议中国对外贸易法二十多年来的首次修订，中国政府试图为其在贸易冲突中可以采取的反制措施提供法律支持。【原文：China's top legislative body on Monday began reviewing the first revision in more than two decades of the country's foreign trade law, as Beijing seeks to give legal backing to countermeasures it can take in a trade conflict.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国机器人公司 Unitree 着眼于 70 亿美元的 IPO 估值
item.description: 两位了解中国 Unitree Robotics 公司计划的人士表示，该公司计划首次公开募股，公司估值将高达 500 亿元人民币（70 亿美元）。【原文：China's Unitree Robotics is looking at as much as 50 billion yuan ($7 billion) in company valuation for its planned initial public offering, two people with knowledge of the startup's plans said.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Netskope 着眼于在美国首次公开募股中获得高达 65 亿美元的估值
item.description: 这家基于云计算的网络安全公司周一表示，Netskope 在美国的首次公开募股中寻求最高 65 亿美元的估值，这表明投资者对新股上市的胃口。【原文：Netskope is seeking a valuation of up to $6.5 billion in its initial public offering in the United States, the cloud-based cybersecurity firm said on Monday, signaling investors' appetite for new listings.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 发布会可能缺乏亮点，但传闻中的 iPhone Air 可能会刺激升级
item.description: 当苹果公司周二首次推出新款 iPhone 时，分析人士认为，苹果公司面临的最大挑战将是如何在竞争对手纷纷将人工智能嵌入其产品和服务的情况下，再一次以平淡无奇的方式推出新款 iPhone。【原文：When Apple debuts new iPhones on Tuesday, analysts say its biggest challenge will be to ride out another ho-hum launch as rivals have skated past it in embedding artificial intelligence into their products and services.】

item.title: 票务平台 StubHub 着眼于在美国 IPO 中获得高达 90 亿美元的估值
item.description: 由 Madron Partners 支持的 StubHub 公司周一表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标估值将高达 92 亿美元，成为最新一家恢复因关税不确定性而在四月份推迟的上市计划的公司。【原文：Madron Partners-backed StubHub is targeting a valuation of up to $9.2 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, the ticket reseller said on Monday, becoming the latest company to resume listing plans delayed in April due to tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 主要汽车制造商在慕尼黑车展上宣布了哪些计划？
item.description: 全球知名汽车制造商在慕尼黑车展上展示了最新车型，包括新型电动汽车和低成本汽车，因为欧洲汽车业面临着关税上调、成本上升以及在本土与中国企业竞争等危机。【原文：Prominent global automakers showcased their latest models at the Munich car show, including new EVs and lower-cost vehicles, as Europe's auto sector faces crises ranging from tariff hikes to rising costs and rivalry with Chinese firms on their home turf.】

item.title: 早间竞标政治与薪资
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: EchoStar 将以 170 亿美元向 SpaceX 出售频谱许可证
item.description: EchoStar周一同意以约170亿美元的价格向SpaceX出售其Starlink卫星网络的无线频谱许可证，此前监管机构对其未充分利用的资产进行了审查，这些资产旨在用于5G推广。【原文：EchoStar on Monday agreed to sell wireless spectrum licenses to SpaceX for its Starlink satellite network for about $17 billion, after regulators scrutinized its underused assets intended for a 5G rollout.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪高管表示将于 2025 年底前在匈牙利建立电动车工厂
item.description: 中国比亚迪公司一位高管周一表示，该公司在匈牙利的新电动汽车工厂将于 2025 年底投产。【原文：China’s BYD , will start production at its new electric-vehicle plant in Hungary by the end of 2025, an executive said on Monday.】

item.title: 销售主管称，宝马正密切关注 iX3 在华上市的价格战
item.description: 宝马公司销售主管约亨-高勒（Jochen Goller）周一表示，宝马公司正在关注竞争激烈的中国市场的定价情况，以便明年在中国推出新款 iX3 车型。【原文：BMW is monitoring its highly competitive China market in terms of pricing ahead of the launch of the new iX3 model there next year, head of sales Jochen Goller said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局就 28.7 万辆克莱斯勒小型货车转向问题展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周一表示，已开始对大约 287,000 辆克莱斯勒小型货车的电动助力转向系统进行调查。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it had opened a probe into about 287,000 Stellantis' Chrysler minivans over concerns related to their electric power steering.】

item.title: 随着新股上市加速，数据中心建造商费米公司申请在美国上市
item.description: 能源和数据中心开发公司 Fermi 周一提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请。【原文：Fermi, an energy and data center development company, on Monday filed for an initial public offering in the United States, as companies rush to tap investor enthusiasm for new issues.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在上一交易日回落后因降息希望而上扬
item.description: 受美联储可能很快恢复货币宽松周期的希望升温提振，美国股指期货周一走高，此前华尔街收盘下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Monday, after Wall Street closed lower in the previous session, buoyed by rising hopes that the Federal Reserve could soon resume its monetary easing cycle.】

item.title: Computershare 启动投资参与业务，为北美地区招聘高管
item.description: 全球金融服务公司Computershare表示，公司管理团队正在就如何处理股东关系寻求更多建议，包括改进股东关系的要求，Computershare正在推出一项投资者参与业务，并聘请了摩根大通的一名高管。【原文：Computershare is launching an investor engagement business and hired a JPMorgan Chase executive at a time corporate management teams are looking for more advice on how to handle shareholder relations, including demands for improvements, the global financial services company said.】

item.title: 独家报道随着竞争白热化，特斯拉在美国的市场份额降至2017年以来最低
item.description: 根据研究公司 Cox Automotive 与路透社独家分享的数据，8 月份特斯拉在美国的市场份额降至近八年来的最低点，原因是买家选择了越来越多竞争对手的电动汽车，而不是首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司所提供的陈旧阵容。【原文：Tesla's U.S. market share dropped to a near eight-year low in August as buyers chose electric vehicles from a growing stable of rivals over the aging lineup offered by CEO Elon Musk's company, according to data from research firm Cox Automotive shared exclusively with Reuters.】

item.title: Disney+ 与《金钱大劫案》制作方 Atresmedia 签订流媒体协议
item.description: 迪斯尼公司周一表示，美国娱乐巨头华特-迪斯尼公司与西班牙媒体集团 Atresmedia 签署了一项协议，将其内容整合到流媒体平台 Disney+。【原文：U.S. entertainment giant Walt Disney signed an agreement with Spanish media group Atresmedia to integrate its contents into streaming platform Disney+, Disney said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲最大车展拉开帷幕，特朗普和中国成为焦点
item.description: 周一，各大汽车制造商在慕尼黑车展上展示了最新车型，推出了新型电动汽车和低成本车型，因为欧洲汽车业正在与关税上调、成本上升以及在本土与中国企业的竞争等危机作斗争。【原文：Major automakers showcased their latest models at the Munich car show on Monday, unveiling new EVs and lower-cost models as Europe's auto sector fights crises ranging from tariff hikes to rising costs and rivalry with Chinese firms on their home turf.】

item.title: 英国 PRS 房地产投资信托基金称 KKR 已加入出售程序，Long Harbour 的竞标仍在进行中
item.description: 英国房地产投资信托公司 PRS REIT 周一表示，KKR 已加入其正式出售程序，房地产投资商龙港（Long Harbour）已参与竞标，但补充说，这家美国私募股权公司尚未提出报价。【原文：British real estate investment trust PRS REIT on Monday said KKR joined its formal sale process that already involves a bid from property investor Long Harbour, but added that the U.S. private equity firm had not made an offer.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，中国推动东盟签署贸易协定升级版
item.description: 中国商务部副部长颜东周一表示，中国正在推动东南亚国家联盟在今年年底前签署自由贸易协定升级版，因为在美国加征关税之际，中国政府正寻求实现出口多样化。【原文：China is pushing the Association of Southeast Asian Nations to sign an upgrade to their free trade agreement before the end of the year, Vice Commerce Minister Yan Dong said on Monday, as Beijing seeks to diversify its exports amid U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲区负责人表示，Stellantis 将放弃到 2030 年实现 100% 电动汽车的目标
item.description: 法意汽车制造商 Stellantis 扩大欧洲业务主管让-菲利浦-伊姆帕拉托（Jean-Philippe Imparato）周一表示，将不再追求到 2030 年只生产电动汽车的目标，并补充说，该公司即将推出的名为 "敢于向前 "的战略计划中的其他目标可能会保留。【原文：Franco-Italian carmaker Stellantis will no longer pursue a target of producing only electric vehicles by 2030, said Jean-Philippe Imparato, head of enlarged Europe, on Monday, adding that other goals in its upcoming strategic plan known as 'Dare Forward" may remain.】

item.title: 独家报道日本聘请伍德麦肯兹评估特朗普支持的阿拉斯加液化天然气项目
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，日本已聘请能源咨询公司伍德麦肯兹（Wood Mackenzie）对拟议中的800英里阿拉斯加天然气管道和液化天然气工厂进行评估，这表明日本正在权衡是否支持美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）吹捧的这个价值440亿美元的项目。【原文：Japan has hired energy consultancy Wood Mackenzie to assess a proposed 800-mile Alaska gas pipeline and LNG plant in a sign it is weighing support for the $44 billion project touted by U.S. President Donald Trump, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国电动车和混合动力车销量增速为 18 个月来最慢
item.description: 随着中国政府继续努力制止惩罚性的价格战，中国 8 月份电动汽车和混合动力汽车的销量增速为一年半以来最慢。【原文：China's August sales of electric vehicles and hybrids grew at the slowest pace in one and a half years as the government continues efforts to halt punishing price wars.】

item.title: 由于关税影响，世界银行将越南经济增长预期下调至 6.6
item.description: 世界银行周一下调了对越南经济增长的预测，原因是有证据表明美国的关税开始对这个东南亚出口国的货运产生影响。【原文：The World Bank on Monday trimmed its forecast for Vietnam's economic growth on evidence that U.S. tariffs were starting to have an impact on the Southeast Asian exporter's shipments.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官：迄今为止，关税已导致集团损失数十亿美元
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司首席执行官周一表示，到目前为止，美国关税已使该公司损失数十亿欧元，并补充说，其主要品牌保时捷正受到关税和疲软的中国市场 "三明治 "的挤压。【原文：U.S. tariffs have cost Volkswagen , Europe's largest carmaker, billions of euros so far, its chief executive said on Monday, adding that its key brand Porsche was being squeezed in a "sandwich" of duties and a weak Chinese market.】

item.title: 西班牙 BBVA 银行以 148 亿欧元收购萨瓦德尔银行
item.description: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）周一正式启动了对规模较小的竞争对手萨瓦德尔（Sabadell）148 亿欧元（173.4 亿美元）的恶意收购。【原文：Spain's BBVA on Monday formally launched a 14.8 billion euros ($17.34 billion) hostile takeover bid for smaller rival Sabadell .】
